divs: sighting details it was 3:00am in th morning. i was looking up onto the night and noticed a strange star in the distance that seemed to (blinking) at me? it seemed as if i could touch it-a pulling effect or my curiosity...it started to freak me out???instead of panicing i reached for my cameera..as to say, im not going anywhere!!stay and get the shot photography first freak out later...after i came inside. i went to my computer to download my (pic's)photography talk..followed by darkroom..there were another person who noticed the blinking lights..he was toasted(drunk), and he was raving on about the lights he saw..just earlier this night...i have seen a photo also of a light with clouds around it with a ""state sized object""flowed out of it-the ball of cloudy light...with lines or the side corner of the ship.it had 2 or 3 light lines with variances in light.like something "huge"\"enormous"\"collossal" ......then the light went out..and the ufo vanished..{pid}
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other,Unknown
trends: There have been 29 other sightings in Durham
There were no other sightings in Durham on or around December 3rd 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: It looked like 4 orbs in formation of three across, and one centered under #2 orb.
